rotation.description: Arms is primarily a PvP spec in TBC but brings Blood Frenzy raid debuff. Uses 2H weapons with Mortal Strike.

priority.name: Mortal Strike
priority.description: Use on cooldown - primary damage ability

priority.name: Whirlwind
priority.description: Use on cooldown for additional damage

priority.name: Execute
priority.description: Spam below 20% HP for massive damage

priority.name: Slam
priority.description: Use between MS cooldowns if you have swing timer addon

priority.name: Heroic Strike
priority.description: Dump excess rage when abilities on CD

cooldowns.name: Death Wish
cooldowns.description: Use with Heroism or execute phase

cooldowns.name: Sweeping Strikes
cooldowns.description: Use before Whirlwind for AoE - hits additional target

cooldowns.name: Bladestorm
cooldowns.description: Major AoE cooldown if specced

rotation.notes: Blood Frenzy debuff increases all physical damage to target by 4%. Keep Battle Shout up. Slam requires swing timer to use effectively without clipping auto-attacks.

0.name: PreRaid
bis: Into the Heart of the Labyrinth

rotation.description: Fury Warriors use a priority system rather than a fixed rotation. Dual-wield for maximum DPS.

priority.name: Bloodthirst
priority.description: Use on cooldown - your highest priority ability

priority.name: Whirlwind
priority.description: Use on cooldown when Bloodthirst is unavailable

priority.name: Execute
priority.description: Use below 20% HP as filler between BT/WW cooldowns

priority.name: Heroic Strike
priority.description: Dump excess rage (60+) when other abilities on CD

priority.name: Hamstring
priority.description: Only when excess rage and nothing else available

cooldowns.name: Death Wish
cooldowns.description: Use with Heroism/Bloodlust or during Execute phase for 20% damage boost

cooldowns.name: Recklessness
cooldowns.description: Stack with Death Wish and trinkets for burst windows

cooldowns.name: Berserker Rage
cooldowns.description: Use on CD for rage generation and fear immunity

rotation.notes: Keep Battle Shout or Commanding Shout up at all times. Heroic Strike removes dual-wield miss penalty while queued - use liberally at high rage. For AoE: prioritize Whirlwind and use Cleave instead of Heroic Strike.

0.name: PreRaid
bis: Into the Heart of the Labyrinth

rotation.description: Protection Warriors focus on threat generation and damage mitigation. Stance dance for abilities when safe.

priority.name: Shield Slam
priority.description: Highest threat ability - use on cooldown

priority.name: Revenge
priority.description: Very cheap, high threat per rage - use when proc'd

priority.name: Devastate
priority.description: Filler ability, applies Sunder Armor stacks

priority.name: Heroic Strike
priority.description: Queue on every auto attack when rage allows

priority.name: Shield Block
priority.description: Use frequently for mitigation and Revenge procs

cooldowns.name: Shield Wall
cooldowns.description: 40% damage reduction - save for emergency or planned damage

cooldowns.name: Last Stand
cooldowns.description: 30% max HP boost - use when taking heavy damage

cooldowns.name: Spell Reflection
cooldowns.description: Reflect next spell - great for caster mobs

rotation.notes: Keep Demoralizing Shout and Thunder Clap up on all mobs. For AoE: Thunder Clap on CD, tab-Devastate to spread threat. Stance dance to Battle Stance for Challenging Shout if needed.

0.name: PreRaid
bis: How to Break Into the Arcatraz
Someone Else's Hard Work Pays Off

1.name: Phase 1 (T4/Karazhan)
bis: Violet Signet of the Great Protector

rotation.description: Combat Rogues are the top melee DPS in TBC. Focus on keeping Slice and Dice up while maximizing finisher damage.

priority.name: Slice and Dice
priority.description: ALWAYS keep up - #1 priority. Start with 1 CP S&D

priority.name: Expose Armor
priority.description: 5 CP if assigned (no Sunder warrior)

priority.name: Rupture
priority.description: 5 CP - keep up on boss for sustained damage

priority.name: Sinister Strike
priority.description: Combo point builder - spam between finishers

priority.name: Eviscerate
priority.description: 5 CP when S&D and Rupture have time remaining

cooldowns.name: Blade Flurry
cooldowns.description: Attacks hit additional target - use on CD or save for adds

cooldowns.name: Adrenaline Rush
cooldowns.description: 100% energy regen for 15s - use with Heroism

cooldowns.name: Thistle Tea
cooldowns.description: Instant 100 energy - use during Adrenaline Rush

rotation.notes: Energy ticker addon is essential - never cap energy above 80. 1 CP S&D opener, then 5 CP finishers. Combat Swords or Combat Fists depending on weapon availability. Keep poisons up: Instant on MH, Deadly on OH.

rotation.description: BM Hunters focus on pet damage and steady shot weaving. Most popular raiding spec in TBC.

priority.name: Kill Command
priority.description: Use immediately when it procs - 100% uptime possible

priority.name: Steady Shot
priority.description: Weave between Auto Shots (1:1 rotation)

priority.name: Auto Shot
priority.description: Never clip your Auto Shot - use swing timer

priority.name: Multi-Shot
priority.description: Use on CD in raids if mana allows

priority.name: Arcane Shot
priority.description: Only with Aspect mastery or excess mana

cooldowns.name: Bestial Wrath
cooldowns.description: Save for Heroism/Bloodlust for max damage

cooldowns.name: Rapid Fire
cooldowns.description: Stack with Bestial Wrath and Heroism

cooldowns.name: Intimidation
cooldowns.description: Pet stun - use for utility

rotation.notes: 1:1 ROTATION: Auto Shot  Steady Shot  Auto Shot  Steady Shot. Use swing timer addon. Kill Command is off GCD - use instantly when available. Keep pet alive with Mend Pet. Aspect of the Hawk for DPS.

0.name: PreRaid
bis: Reward fromFel Embersin Hellfire PeninsulaEpoch HunterinOld Hillsbrad Foothills

rotation.description: MM Hunters bring Trueshot Aura for physical DPS. Higher personal damage potential than BM at high gear levels.

priority.name: Steady Shot
priority.description: Weave between Auto Shots

priority.name: Auto Shot
priority.description: Never clip - highest priority

priority.name: Arcane Shot
priority.description: Use on CD with 5pc T6 bonus

priority.name: Multi-Shot
priority.description: Use on CD for extra damage

priority.name: Kill Command
priority.description: Use when proc'd if talented

cooldowns.name: Rapid Fire
cooldowns.description: Use with Heroism for burst phase

cooldowns.name: Readiness
cooldowns.description: Resets all cooldowns - double Rapid Fire

rotation.notes: Trueshot Aura gives 125 AP to party. Similar rotation to BM but without Bestial Wrath. Use Aimed Shot if moving or for opening burst. 1:1 or 1:1.5 shot rotation depending on haste.

0.name: PreRaid
bis: Reward fromFel Embersin Hellfire PeninsulaEpoch HunterinOld Hillsbrad Foothills

rotation.description: Survival Hunters bring Expose Weakness debuff, buffing all physical DPS in the raid. Support spec.

priority.name: Steady Shot
priority.description: Main shot - weave with Auto Shot

priority.name: Auto Shot
priority.description: Never clip auto shots

priority.name: Arcane Shot
priority.description: Use for Expose Weakness procs

priority.name: Multi-Shot
priority.description: Use on CD

priority.name: Raptor Strike
priority.description: Only if in melee range

cooldowns.name: Rapid Fire
cooldowns.description: Use with Heroism

cooldowns.name: Readiness
cooldowns.description: Reset all CDs for double Rapid Fire

rotation.notes: EXPOSE WEAKNESS: Crits apply debuff giving AP equal to 25% of your Agility to all attackers. Stack Agility gear. One SV hunter per raid for the debuff. Lower personal DPS but huge raid benefit.

bis: Reward fromFel Embersin Hellfire PeninsulaEpoch HunterinOld Hillsbrad Foothills

rotation.description: Holy Paladins are single-target healing specialists with powerful cooldowns and buffs.

priority.name: Flash of Light
priority.description: Primary heal - fast, efficient, spammable

priority.name: Holy Light
priority.description: Big heal for tank damage spikes

priority.name: Holy Shock
priority.description: Instant heal - use on CD for Holy Shock build

priority.name: Cleanse
priority.description: Remove poison, disease, and magic effects

priority.name: Blessing of Light
priority.description: Keep on tank for boosted healing

cooldowns.name: Divine Favor
cooldowns.description: Next heal is guaranteed crit - pair with Holy Light

cooldowns.name: Divine Illumination
cooldowns.description: 50% mana cost reduction for 15s - use during high damage

cooldowns.name: Lay on Hands
cooldowns.description: Emergency full heal on tank

rotation.notes: Keep Blessing of Light on tanks, Blessing of Wisdom/Salvation on raid. Use Seal of Wisdom and judge for mana return. Pre-cast Holy Light for predictable damage.

1.name: Phase 1 (T4/Karazhan)
bis: Stainless Cloak of the Pure Hearted

rotation.description: Protection Paladins excel at AoE tanking with Consecration and Holy Shield. Mana-based threat generation.

priority.name: Holy Shield
priority.description: Keep up at all times - blocks and deals damage

priority.name: Consecration
priority.description: Primary AoE threat - use on CD

priority.name: Avenger's Shield
priority.description: Ranged pull and threat - use on CD

priority.name: Judgement
priority.description: Judge Righteousness for single target threat

priority.name: Exorcism
priority.description: Use against Undead/Demons for extra threat

cooldowns.name: Ardent Defender
cooldowns.description: Passive - reduces damage below 35% HP

cooldowns.name: Divine Shield
cooldowns.description: Emergency immunity - drops threat, use carefully

cooldowns.name: Blessing of Protection
cooldowns.description: Save raid members from physical damage

rotation.notes: Use Seal of Righteousness or Seal of Vengeance for single target. Seal of Wisdom for mana-intensive fights. Spiritual Attunement returns mana when healed - take damage to generate mana. Best AoE tank in TBC.

5.name: Phase 5 (SWP)
bis: Blue's Greaves of the Righteous Guardian

rotation.description: Retribution Paladins use Seal twisting for maximum DPS. Brings Sanctity Aura and Judgement of the Crusader for raid.

priority.name: Crusader Strike
priority.description: Use on cooldown - refreshes Judgements

priority.name: Judgement
priority.description: Use on CD - off the GCD so weave between abilities

priority.name: Seal of Blood
priority.description: Maintain for auto-attack procs (Horde)

priority.name: Seal of Command
priority.description: For Seal twisting or if no Blood (Alliance)

priority.name: Hammer of Wrath
priority.description: Execute ability below 20% - use on CD

priority.name: Consecration
priority.description: Use for AoE or if mana allows on single target

cooldowns.name: Avenging Wrath
cooldowns.description: 30% damage increase for 20s - use with Heroism

rotation.notes: SEAL TWISTING: Cast Seal of Blood ~0.4s before melee swing while Seal of Command is active to proc both seals. Keep Judgement of Crusader up if no other Ret. Use Sanctity Aura for 10% Holy damage increase to raid.

rotation.description: Holy Priests are versatile healers with strong single-target and AoE healing options.

priority.name: Prayer of Mending
priority.description: Cast on tank on CD - bounces on damage taken

priority.name: Circle of Healing
priority.description: Instant AoE heal - use for group damage

priority.name: Flash Heal
priority.description: Fast efficient heal for spot healing

priority.name: Greater Heal
priority.description: Big heal for tank damage

priority.name: Renew
priority.description: HoT - keep on tank or raid as needed

priority.name: Prayer of Healing
priority.description: Group AoE heal when CoH on CD

cooldowns.name: Inner Focus
cooldowns.description: Free spell + 25% crit - use with Greater Heal

cooldowns.name: Pain Suppression
cooldowns.description: 40% damage reduction on target (if Disc)

cooldowns.name: Guardian Spirit
cooldowns.description: Prevents death (if talented)

rotation.notes: Keep Prayer of Mending bouncing. Use Binding Heal when you need healing too. Downrank heals for mana efficiency. Keep Power Word: Fortitude and Divine Spirit on raid.

rotation.description: Shadow Priests provide mana regeneration to their party via Vampiric Touch. Essential support class.

priority.name: Vampiric Touch
priority.description: MUST keep up - returns mana to party on damage

priority.name: Shadow Word: Pain
priority.description: Highest damage per cast time - never let fall off

priority.name: Mind Blast
priority.description: Use on CD - high damage nuke

priority.name: Shadow Word: Death
priority.description: Execute - use on CD, watch your health

priority.name: Mind Flay
priority.description: Filler spell - clip if MB or SW:D ready

cooldowns.name: Shadowfiend
cooldowns.description: Mana regen pet - use when below 50% mana

cooldowns.name: Inner Focus
cooldowns.description: Free spell - use with Mind Blast

rotation.notes: VAMPIRIC TOUCH returns 5% of shadow damage as mana to party - you're brought for this. Keep VT and SW:P up 100%. One Shadow Priest per healer/caster group. Shadow Weaving debuff increases shadow damage for Warlocks.

bis: Into the Heart of the Labyrinth

rotation.description: Elemental Shamans bring Totem of Wrath for caster groups. Simple rotation focused on Lightning Bolt.

priority.name: Lightning Bolt
priority.description: Primary nuke - spam between other abilities

priority.name: Chain Lightning
priority.description: Use with Elemental Mastery or on multiple targets

priority.name: Flame Shock
priority.description: Only when movement required

priority.name: Earth Shock
priority.description: Interrupt or when Lightning Bolt not possible

cooldowns.name: Elemental Mastery
cooldowns.description: Next spell instant + guaranteed crit - use with CL

cooldowns.name: Heroism
cooldowns.description: Raid cooldown - coordinate with raid leader

cooldowns.name: Bloodlust
cooldowns.description: Horde version of Heroism

rotation.notes: TOTEM OF WRATH: 3% spell hit and crit to party. Place totems before pull. Use Wrath of Air Totem for caster group. Mana Spring in healer group. Lightning Bolt spam is 90% of your damage.

rotation.description: Enhancement Shamans bring Windfury Totem and Unleashed Rage for melee groups. Totem twisting for max DPS.

priority.name: Stormstrike
priority.description: Use on CD - applies Nature damage debuff

priority.name: Earth Shock
priority.description: Use after Stormstrike for bonus damage

priority.name: Flame Shock
priority.description: Keep DoT up between shocks

priority.name: Shamanistic Rage
priority.description: Use on CD for mana and damage reduction

cooldowns.name: Heroism
cooldowns.description: Raid cooldown - coordinate with raid

cooldowns.name: Bloodlust
cooldowns.description: Horde version

cooldowns.name: Shamanistic Rage
cooldowns.description: 30% damage reduction + mana regen

rotation.notes: TOTEM TWISTING: Drop Windfury, wait 9 seconds, drop Grace of Air, repeat. Both buffs stay active. Unleashed Rage gives 10% AP to party on crits. Use slow weapons (2.6+ speed) for bigger Windfury hits.

rotation.description: Resto Shamans excel at group healing with Chain Heal. Bring totems and Heroism/Bloodlust.

priority.name: Chain Heal
priority.description: Primary heal - bounces to 2 additional targets

priority.name: Lesser Healing Wave
priority.description: Fast single target heal

priority.name: Healing Wave
priority.description: Big heal for heavy tank damage

priority.name: Earth Shield
priority.description: Keep on tank - heals when hit

priority.name: Riptide
priority.description: Instant HoT + boosts next Chain Heal (if talented)

cooldowns.name: Nature's Swiftness
cooldowns.description: Instant cast next spell - use with Healing Wave

cooldowns.name: Mana Tide Totem
cooldowns.description: Party mana regen - use at 50% mana

cooldowns.name: Heroism
cooldowns.description: Raid cooldown

rotation.notes: Earth Shield on main tank always. Chain Heal on melee clump for maximum bounces. Mana Spring Totem for healers, Wrath of Air for casters. Downrank Chain Heal for mana efficiency.

rotation.description: Balance Druids (Moonkins) bring 5% spell crit aura and Faerie Fire. Starfire spam rotation.

priority.name: Faerie Fire
priority.description: Keep debuff on boss (-610 armor)

priority.name: Moonfire
priority.description: Keep DoT up, refresh at end

priority.name: Insect Swarm
priority.description: Keep up if moving, otherwise skip for mana

priority.name: Starfire
priority.description: SPAM - main damage spell

priority.name: Wrath
priority.description: Only for movement or very short fights

cooldowns.name: Force of Nature
cooldowns.description: Summon 3 Treants - use when they'll survive

cooldowns.name: Innervate
cooldowns.description: 400% mana regen - use on yourself or healer

rotation.notes: Moonkin Aura gives 5% spell crit to party - always be in caster group. Faerie Fire is essential for physical DPS. If mana is an issue, drop DoTs and just spam Starfire. Use Hurricane for AoE.

rotation.description: Feral Cat DPS requires complex rotation with powershifting. Brings Leader of the Pack crit aura.

priority.name: Mangle (Cat)
priority.description: Keep debuff up - increases bleed damage

priority.name: Rip
priority.description: 5 CP finisher - keep up on long fights

priority.name: Shred
priority.description: Main combo point builder - must be behind target

priority.name: Ferocious Bite
priority.description: 5 CP finisher if target dying before Rip ends

priority.name: Tiger's Fury
priority.description: Only use at 100 energy before gaining more

cooldowns.name: Berserk
cooldowns.description: Reduces ability costs - use with Heroism (if talented)

rotation.notes: POWERSHIFTING: Shift out and back to Cat Form for instant energy from Furor talent. Requires Wolfshead Helm. Very complex rotation - use addon like Feral by Night. Leader of the Pack gives 5% crit to party.

0.name: PreRaid
bis: How to Break Into the Arcatraz

rotation.description: Feral Bear tanks have high HP and armor but limited cooldowns. Great off-tanks and DPS hybrids.

priority.name: Mangle (Bear)
priority.description: Highest threat ability - use on CD

priority.name: Lacerate
priority.description: Stack to 5, refresh before falling off

priority.name: Swipe
priority.description: Use for AoE threat on multiple mobs

priority.name: Maul
priority.description: Queue on every auto attack if rage allows

priority.name: Faerie Fire (Feral)
priority.description: Keep debuff up for armor reduction

cooldowns.name: Frenzied Regeneration
cooldowns.description: Convert rage to healing - use when low HP

cooldowns.name: Barkskin
cooldowns.description: 20% damage reduction - use preemptively (drops form)

cooldowns.name: Enrage
cooldowns.description: Generate rage before pull

rotation.notes: No Shield Block equivalent - avoid crushing blows via pure armor and HP. Leader of the Pack gives 5% crit to party. Can easily swap to Cat for DPS when not tanking. Stack armor and HP.

rotation.description: Resto Druids are HoT-focused healers. Excellent tank healers and raid healers with Lifebloom.

priority.name: Lifebloom
priority.description: Stack 3x on tank, let bloom or refresh at 1s

priority.name: Rejuvenation
priority.description: HoT for raid healing - spread on raid

priority.name: Regrowth
priority.description: Direct heal + HoT - use for burst healing

priority.name: Healing Touch
priority.description: Big slow heal - rarely used

priority.name: Swiftmend
priority.description: Instant heal consuming Rejuv/Regrowth HoT

cooldowns.name: Nature's Swiftness
cooldowns.description: Instant cast next spell - pair with HT

cooldowns.name: Innervate
cooldowns.description: Massive mana regen - use on self or healers

cooldowns.name: Tranquility
cooldowns.description: Channeled AoE heal - emergency button

rotation.notes: LIFEBLOOM ROLLING: Stack 3x Lifebloom on tank, refresh at 1 second to keep bloom heal and mana return. Tree of Life form reduces mana costs. Use HoTs preemptively - you're a proactive healer.

rotation.description: Affliction Warlocks maintain multiple DoTs for sustained damage. Brings Malediction for caster debuff.

priority.name: Curse of Doom
priority.description: Use on long fights (60s duration)

priority.name: Curse of Agony
priority.description: Use on shorter fights or if assigned

priority.name: Corruption
priority.description: Keep up 100% - high damage DoT

priority.name: Unstable Affliction
priority.description: Keep up - dispel protection + damage

priority.name: Siphon Life
priority.description: Keep up when Shadow Vuln active

priority.name: Immolate
priority.description: Keep up for extra DoT damage

priority.name: Shadow Bolt
priority.description: Filler between DoT refreshes

cooldowns.name: Demonic Sacrifice
cooldowns.description: Sacrifice Succubus for 15% Shadow damage (if specced)

rotation.notes: Malediction (Curse of Elements) increases spell damage taken by 3% - one Warlock should keep this up. Refresh DoTs before they fall off. Life Tap for mana. Dark Pact if using Imp.

0.name: PreRaid
bis: Into the Heart of the Labyrinth

rotation.description: Demonology Warlocks use the Felguard pet for damage. Strong AoE with Seed of Corruption.

priority.name: Curse of Doom
priority.description: Use on long boss fights

priority.name: Corruption
priority.description: Keep up on target

priority.name: Immolate
priority.description: Keep up for DoT damage

priority.name: Shadow Bolt
priority.description: Main filler nuke

priority.name: Incinerate
priority.description: Alternative filler if Fire specced

cooldowns.name: Demonic Empowerment
cooldowns.description: Boost Felguard damage

cooldowns.name: Soul Link
cooldowns.description: Passive 20% damage shared with pet - keep pet alive

rotation.notes: Felguard does good damage - keep it alive and on target. Soul Link makes you tanky. Good for dungeons and AoE with Seed of Corruption. Life Tap for mana, Fel Armor for damage.

0.name: PreRaid
bis: Into the Heart of the Labyrinth

rotation.description: Destruction Warlocks have the simplest rotation - Shadow Bolt spam. Highest single-target DPS spec.

priority.name: Curse of Doom
priority.description: Use on boss fights (60s duration)

priority.name: Curse of Elements
priority.description: If no Affliction lock, apply for raid

priority.name: Immolate
priority.description: Keep up for Conflagrate proc

priority.name: Shadow Bolt
priority.description: SPAM - 90%+ of your damage

cooldowns.name: Demonic Sacrifice
cooldowns.description: Sacrifice Succubus for 15% Shadow damage

rotation.notes: Simple rotation: Keep curse up, spam Shadow Bolt. Sacrifice Succubus for 15% shadow damage boost. ISB (Improved Shadow Bolt) debuff increases shadow damage for all Warlocks - coordinate. Life Tap for mana.

0.name: PreRaid
bis: Into the Heart of the Labyrinth

rotation.description: Arcane Mages have the highest burst DPS in TBC but are mana-intensive. Requires good mana management.

priority.name: Arcane Blast
priority.description: Spam during burn phase (3 stacks then frostbolt)

priority.name: Frostbolt
priority.description: Filler during mana conservation phase

priority.name: Arcane Missiles
priority.description: Use Missile Barrage procs if talented

cooldowns.name: Arcane Power
cooldowns.description: 30% damage boost - use with Icy Veins

cooldowns.name: Presence of Mind
cooldowns.description: Instant cast next spell - pair with Arcane Blast

cooldowns.name: Icy Veins
cooldowns.description: 20% haste - stack with Arcane Power

cooldowns.name: Cold Snap
cooldowns.description: Resets Icy Veins - double IV window

rotation.notes: BURN PHASE: Pop all CDs, spam Arcane Blast until OOM. CONSERVE PHASE: 3x Arcane Blast  3x Frostbolt rotation. Use Mage Armor for mana regen. Evocate when safe. Super Mana Potion on CD.

rotation.description: Fire Mages have consistent damage with simple rotation. Gains power with Molten Fury below 20%.

priority.name: Scorch
priority.description: Apply 5 stacks of Improved Scorch debuff first

priority.name: Fireball
priority.description: Main nuke - spam after Scorch stacks

priority.name: Fire Blast
priority.description: Instant - use while moving

cooldowns.name: Combustion
cooldowns.description: Crit boost - use when Heroism/below 20%

cooldowns.name: Icy Veins
cooldowns.description: 20% haste - use with Combustion

cooldowns.name: Cold Snap
cooldowns.description: Resets Icy Veins for double haste

rotation.notes: Keep 5 stacks of Improved Scorch debuff up (coordinate with other Fire mages). Molten Fury gives 20% damage boost below 20% HP - save cooldowns for this. Use Molten Armor for crit.

rotation.description: Frost is primarily a PvP/leveling spec in TBC but viable for AoE farming and early progression.

priority.name: Frostbolt
priority.description: Main nuke - spam for single target

priority.name: Ice Lance
priority.description: Use on Fingers of Frost procs

priority.name: Cone of Cold
priority.description: AoE - use for Blizzard kiting

priority.name: Blizzard
priority.description: AoE channeled - use for dungeon farming

cooldowns.name: Icy Veins
cooldowns.description: 20% haste - use on CD

cooldowns.name: Cold Snap
cooldowns.description: Resets all Frost CDs including Ice Block

cooldowns.name: Summon Water Elemental
cooldowns.description: 45s pet - use on CD for damage

rotation.notes: Lower raid DPS than Fire/Arcane but excellent AoE and survivability. Water Elemental does good damage - keep it alive. Use for dungeons and AoE farming. Ice Armor for PvP.
